      • hasWall

        public boolean hasWall(org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.TileDirection direction)
        Checks for a wall in the given direction of this tile and for a wall in the opposite direction of the tile in the given direction if present. For combined directions (e.g. NORTHWEST) the function will return true if there is a wall for any of the single directions (e.g. NORTH or WEST)
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction to check
        Returns:
        true if this location has a wall in the given direction or the location in the given direction, if present, has a border in the opposite direction, false otherwise.
